name: Current Account Personal
details: Perform your financial transaction with pride and convenience. With People’s Current Account, you can obtain credit facilities fast, to suit your requirements. You can encash cheques from the widest network of branches & issue cheques which are as good as cash when you open a People’s Current Account. That’s not all, operating a People’s Current Account gives you access to a host of other benefits such as, the ability to deposit cash from our CDMs 24/7 days, and to enjoy the convenience of self banking, mobile, internet & voice banking services. Special benefits Special benefits: Deposit cash from our CDMs 24X365 Enjoy the convenience of self banking, mobile, internet & voice banking services Minimum charges (service charge and other relevant charges) An internationally valid debit card is on offer to access your account Priority in obtaining Loan Facilities
